name: DeltaGenerated.mk.inj
initialProofState:
toTop✝ : TopCat
deltaGenerated✝ : autoParam (DeltaGeneratedSpace ↑toTop✝) _auto✝
toTop : TopCat
deltaGenerated : autoParam (DeltaGeneratedSpace ↑toTop) _auto✝
x✝ : Eq { toTop := toTop✝, deltaGenerated := deltaGenerated✝ } { toTop := toTop, deltaGenerated := deltaGenerated }
⊢ Eq toTop✝ toTop
decl:
/-- The type of delta-generated topological spaces. -/
structure DeltaGenerated where
  /-- the underlying topological space -/
  toTop : TopCat.{u}
  /-- The underlying topological space is delta-generated. -/
  deltaGenerated : DeltaGeneratedSpace toTop := by infer_instance

name: DeltaGenerated.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
toTop : TopCat
deltaGenerated : autoParam (DeltaGeneratedSpace ↑toTop) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf { toTop := toTop, deltaGenerated := deltaGenerated }) (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd 1 (SizeOf.sizeOf toTop)) (SizeOf.sizeOf deltaGenerated))
decl:
/-- The type of delta-generated topological spaces. -/
structure DeltaGenerated where
  /-- the underlying topological space -/
  toTop : TopCat.{u}
  /-- The underlying topological space is delta-generated. -/
  deltaGenerated : DeltaGeneratedSpace toTop := by infer_instance

name: DeltaGenerated.mk.injEq
initialProofState:
toTop✝ : TopCat
deltaGenerated✝ : autoParam (DeltaGeneratedSpace ↑toTop✝) _auto✝
toTop : TopCat
deltaGenerated : autoParam (DeltaGeneratedSpace ↑toTop) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (Eq { toTop := toTop✝, deltaGenerated := deltaGenerated✝ } { toTop := toTop, deltaGenerated := deltaGenerated }) (Eq toTop✝ toTop)
decl:
/-- The type of delta-generated topological spaces. -/
structure DeltaGenerated where
  /-- the underlying topological space -/
  toTop : TopCat.{u}
  /-- The underlying topological space is delta-generated. -/
  deltaGenerated : DeltaGeneratedSpace toTop := by infer_instance

name: DeltaGenerated.deltaGenerated
decl:
/-- The type of delta-generated topological spaces. -/
structure DeltaGenerated where
  /-- the underlying topological space -/
  toTop : TopCat.{u}
  /-- The underlying topological space is delta-generated. -/
  deltaGenerated : DeltaGeneratedSpace toTop := by infer_instance

name: DeltaGenerated.deltaGeneratedToTop_map
initialProofState:
X✝ Y✝ : CategoryTheory.InducedCategory TopCat DeltaGenerated.toTop
f : Quiver.Hom X✝ Y✝
⊢ Eq (DeltaGenerated.deltaGeneratedToTop.map f) f
decl:
/-- The forgetful functor `DeltaGenerated ⥤ TopCat` -/
@[simps!]
def deltaGeneratedToTop : DeltaGenerated.{u} ⥤ TopCat.{u} :=
  inducedFunctor _

name: DeltaGenerated.deltaGeneratedToTop_obj
decl:
/-- The forgetful functor `DeltaGenerated ⥤ TopCat` -/
@[simps!]
def deltaGeneratedToTop : DeltaGenerated.{u} ⥤ TopCat.{u} :=
  inducedFunctor _

name: DeltaGenerated.topToDeltaGenerated_obj_toTop_str_IsOpen
initialProofState:
X : TopCat
u : Set ↑X
⊢ Eq (TopologicalSpace.IsOpen u) (Membership.mem (SupSet.sSup (Set.image (fun t => OrderDual.toDual (setOf fun s => IsOpen s)) (Set.range fun f => TopologicalSpace.coinduced (⇑f.snd) inferInstance))) u)
decl:
/-- The faithful (but not full) functor taking each topological space to its delta-generated
  coreflection. -/
@[simps!]
def topToDeltaGenerated : TopCat.{u} ⥤ DeltaGenerated.{u} where
  obj X := of (DeltaGeneratedSpace.of X)
  map {_ Y} f := ⟨f, (continuous_to_deltaGenerated (Y := Y)).mpr <|
    continuous_le_dom deltaGenerated_le f.continuous⟩

name: DeltaGenerated.topToDeltaGenerated_obj_toTop_α
decl:
/-- The faithful (but not full) functor taking each topological space to its delta-generated
  coreflection. -/
@[simps!]
def topToDeltaGenerated : TopCat.{u} ⥤ DeltaGenerated.{u} where
  obj X := of (DeltaGeneratedSpace.of X)
  map {_ Y} f := ⟨f, (continuous_to_deltaGenerated (Y := Y)).mpr <|
    continuous_le_dom deltaGenerated_le f.continuous⟩

name: DeltaGenerated.topToDeltaGenerated_map_apply
initialProofState:
x✝ Y : TopCat
f : Quiver.Hom x✝ Y
a : ↑x✝
⊢ Eq ((DeltaGenerated.topToDeltaGenerated.map f) a) (f a)
decl:
/-- The faithful (but not full) functor taking each topological space to its delta-generated
  coreflection. -/
@[simps!]
def topToDeltaGenerated : TopCat.{u} ⥤ DeltaGenerated.{u} where
  obj X := of (DeltaGeneratedSpace.of X)
  map {_ Y} f := ⟨f, (continuous_to_deltaGenerated (Y := Y)).mpr <|
    continuous_le_dom deltaGenerated_le f.continuous⟩

name: DeltaGenerated.instFaithfulTopCatTopToDeltaGenerated
decl:
instance : topToDeltaGenerated.{u}.Faithful :=
  ⟨fun h ↦ by ext x; exact congrFun (congrArg ContinuousMap.toFun h) x⟩

name: DeltaGenerated.hasLimits
decl:
instance hasLimits : Limits.HasLimits DeltaGenerated :=
  hasLimits_of_coreflective deltaGeneratedToTop
